name: Dungeons V.S. DiceGuy
description:
Made for the GMTK Game Jam 2022 under the theme "Roll of the Dice."

Controls: 

WASD/Arrow Keys - Movement

P/ESC - Pause and unpause

tap R - Rewind back one move

hold R - Restart level

Level 1 is missing the key... oops... we have level select!

Credits:

Programming and Design - RemyTheRat

Sound Design and Music - BigCheese73

Programming and FX  - Csaki01

Art and Design -  Saiou
